snippet.title: Karma: The Dark World Story Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description:
A new trailer for Karma: The Dark World dug into the game's thrilling alt-history narrative, where you play an agent of The Thought Bureau and dive into the minds of the accused. It's coming to PC and PlayStation 5 on March 27.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #karma #Karmathedarkworld

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
